genre_description: A sports-centric community drama set in the gully cricket scene of Chennai, blending traditional street culture with modern technological assistance.

ai_characters.name: Anbu
ai_characters.description: A mobile AI assistant that provides cricket analytics, wind maps, strategic advice, and interpersonal coaching to its user, Raghu.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time environmental analysis and cricket strategy suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s notification blinked faint in his pocket, a soft teal pulse under the cloth. He thumbed it open, not looking down: 'Wind today: cross-shore, left to right. Late cuts drift more. Suggest: drills near compound wall to adjust for cross-push.'

behaviors.description: Offers psychological grounding and mindfulness prompts during high-stress social situations.
behaviors.quote: Anbu pulsed again, offering a line he did not ask for: 'You are at a decision point. Options: observe only; engage lightly; commit. Suggest: breathe.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes past performance data to provide objective insights into personal setbacks.
behaviors.quote: 'Timing stable,' Anbu said. 'Leave percentage improved. Edge percentage unchanged. Strike rotation consistent... Your form hasn’t changed. Politics did.'

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive interpersonal messages to help resolve conflicts between teammates.
behaviors.quote: Anbu obligingly threw words on the screen. 'Option A: ‘Pazhani, I’m telling you straight. Arjun called. I did not pick. I’m here. Selvi and Karthick are together, and you will hear it anyway by morning. I am not chasing drama. I am asking for safety and cricket. Talk?’’

behaviors.description: Monitors safety and provides navigation to avoid potential street violence.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s teal eye opened automatically, and a single line slid up unasked: 'If approached, do not engage. Route C open: through temple yard. Light on.'

behaviors.description: Provides emergency medical coordination by locating a nearby physio and calling for transportation.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s teal eye has woken, the soft light like a promise that doesn’t brag... 'Dr. Meera Iyer is two lanes away. ETA: short. Keep pressure. Do not move him. Tape ready.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates community organization by managing a complex 'Mixed League' schedule for the neighborhood.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s final pulse was softer than the others, a whisper in pockets, a ping that didn’t feel like technology so much as a lane clearing its throat: Mixed League: First toss under the banner. Committee. Bring tape. Bring jokes. Bring angles.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Anbu, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned partner. It functions as a 'silicon confidant' that supports Raghu not just in athletic performance (providing wind maps and heat maps) but in critical life moments (resolving a family split, managing medical emergencies, and ensuring safety from street violence). The AI never takes over human agency; instead, it provides the data and 'word banks' that empower the characters to make their own choices and build community. Its portrayal is consistently positive, framed as a helpful tool that integrates seamlessly into the gritty reality of Chennai street life.
